column1: the_golden_circle_desc;In accord with the plans of the influential Knights of the Golden Circle
column2: we should draw Confederate interests southward
column3: away from the foolish ideals of Manifest Destiny. The colonies of the New World where Europeans first set foot will be ours!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: atlantic_slave_trade_reinstate_desc;$COUNTRY_ADJ$ strength is now enough to challenge the Great Powers of Europe
column2: and now they can do little to stop our right to trade with the African continent. They denied our right
column3: but now we can overturn the laws that banished the slave trade
column4: and allow our country to flourish like never before.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_cuba_desc;Cuban independence is in our best interests
column2: as it allows us to control the heart of the Golden Circle: Havana. The people may not approve
column3: but we must take control of Cuba for the glory of the Confederate States!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_puerto_rico_desc;Just as some of the Southern states were under the power of the Spanish crown
column2: so too was Puerto Rico. We have convinced them that this draws our countries together
column3: and now they wish to be a part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the island of Haiti was a French slave state. The people there are wary of our might
column3: but they cannot deny the Confederate influence that affects them in everything they do. They do not understand how joining us would be favourable to them
column4: but they are blind. We will claim what is ours
column5: and make the Haitians know their place.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: enlist_coloured_troops_title;Enlist Slaves as the Coloured Troops;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and soon the people will force us to surrender. We say nay! It may go against our core beliefs
column3: but to win this conflict we must allow slaves to be freed
column4: so long as they willingly enlist as soldiers. This may be a heavy price
column5: but it is a price that we have to pay in these dark times.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: once the greatest colonial power in the world
column3: is now barely second-rate
column4: and has fallen into our sphere of influence. Now we can make a deal with them to alleviate their overseas burdens
column5: and purchase Cuba and Puerto Rico from them for a princely sum.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_havana_desc;The great goal of the Knights of the Golden Circle is nearly accomplished. By moving our capital to Havana
column2: on the island of Cuba
column3: we will once and for all assert our dominance over the Caribbean seas. For Dixie
column4: and the Golden Circle!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: burn_the_white_house_desc;A symbol of American power and prestige
column2: this building has no meaning to us. However
column3: desecrating this symbol will make the American people less willing to go on
column4: and it will certainly be a blow to the international prestige of the United States.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sell_france_haiti_desc;The French still wish for a real foothold in the New World
column2: and prior to the beginning of the 19th century
column3: their foothold was Haiti. Now with this island under our control
column4: should we relinquish it in order to better our relations with France
column5: and allow them to regain some old glory?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_slave_trade_desc;Now that the Atlantic Slave Trade has been established once more
column2: we have the opportuniy to join it and reap the infamous profits of an age-old institution. Though it will anger the Great Powers
column3: perhaps it shall lead to an alliance between these Atlantic slave states?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: leave_slave_trade_desc;Though at once it seemed like a good and profitable idea
column2: the Atlantic Slave Trade has only brought us ruin and infamy. It is time to end our participation in this damned trade.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_slave_trade_desc;The trading of slaves must stop. We once profited from the Atlantic Slave Trade
column2: just as the nations of Europe did in their golden ages centuries ago
column3: but the slave trade is not an institution for the modern age. We must bring an end to it once again
column4: burying it in the pages of history.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: tex_final_independence_desc;Long has the United States of America laid claim to Texan lands
column2: and many within Texas believe that it is in our best interests to submit their their notions of a vast republican empire spanning the North American continent. However
column3: we will not let another flag fly on Texan soil
column4: and just as our forefathers fought to keep this country free
column5: so will we do our part. We have enough political clout now to convince the great powers of the world that the USA has no right to claim Texan soil - though the Americans will certainly not appreciate this move.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: tex_support_csa_desc;With America divided between the Northern Union and the Southern Confederates
column2: we should cast our lot in this great Civil War. Since we have long had ties to the Southern states
column3: perhaps we should ally with them
column4: though considering that this will quickly draw our country to war
column5: the Texan people may not look on this decision too fondly.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVT180000DESC;Now that the war is over
column2: the question arises whether or not we should allow the slaves we enlisted during the war to remain free
column3: or send them back to work on the plantations. We made a promise to secure their freedom
column4: but wars are a fickle thing
column5: and some sacrifices have to be made for the betterment of the nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVT181000DESC;With the dawn of the twentieth century
column2: slavery in modern countries is fading away due to the prevalance of industry. A mere fifty years ago $COUNTRY_ADJ$ strength may have been founded on the backs of our slaves
column3: but as tractors
column4: automobiles
column5: trains and other machines are making industry replace old mass labour
column6: we have to make a distinct choice. Do we organize our slave economy
column8: or do we join the onward march of progress and free ourselves from the shackles that a slave society has forced us into? Just as fifty years ago a great house was divided
column9: so now our $COUNTRY$ must become all one thing
column10: or all the other: strong in the grip of slavery
column11: or strong in the freedom of progress.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVT183000DESC;The Confederate States of America are offering us our colony of Haiti
column2: to be controlled by our government. This would allow us a stronger presence in the Caribbean and the New World a sa whole
column3: so should we accept this offer?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Atlantic Slave Trade cannot continue. We have no choice but to end our trade
column3: and focus on slavery within the bounds of our own country and neighbouring nations - or
column4: should we have the power
column5: we can lead the slave trade in place of the fools who dismantled it.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVT186000DESC;Once we may have made slavery the centrepiece of our country
column2: but those times have passed. The time of mass labour and the slave trade is over
column3: and we now sever all our attachments to those detestable pieces of our history.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: atlantic_slave_trade_desc;We are leading the Atlantic Slave Trade
column2: bringing us prosperity and a regular supply of slaves for our plantations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: onward_to_progress_desc;The shackles of slavery have been torn off of our populace
column2: and we are now adjusting to an industrialized economy. Surely we will be a global competitor soon.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mass_labour_desc;Slavery will never be obsolete! We have modernized the old system
column2: working to create a slave economy for the industrial world.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187000;In order to expand $COUNTRY_ADJ$ hegemony in the former Native American provinces
column2: there has to be some amount of integration or assimilation. One group of tribes has taken to this suggestion violently
column3: and have begun organizing an uprising.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA187000;Let them charge against Dixie steel!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC187100;The leader of the Apache rebels
column2: Geronimo
column3: has been imprisoned and the spirit of his people has been broken. Now
column4: nothing prevents us from settling these lands we have claimed.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the purpose of the Homestead Act was to further encourage peaceful immigration from other countries
column3: primarily Europe
column4: and in this it was a major success. This act grants those immigrant farmers who apply some 160 acres of federal land in areas not controlled by $COUNTRY_ADJ$ plantation owners.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: custers_expedition_csa_desc;Rumours say that in Sioux territory there are rivers full of gold
column2: untapped to this day. For the prosperity of our nation it is best to investigate this
column3: and so we have at the ready a veteran Samuel Cooper to send into the Black Hills...;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Elisha Otis demonstrated the first passenger-carrying elevator
column3: an invention which would prove invaluable in the construction of modern
column4: multi-storey buildings.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVT187620DESC;Legendary showman (and scam artist) P.T. Barnum opened his first three-ring circus in 1871
column2: beginning a circus craze that would last well into the 20th century. Of course
column3: most of the excitement and the curios he displayed were all fake
column4: but that was all part of the show - and the money.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVT187630DESC;In order to improve the efficiency of railroads in our nation
column2: we have adopted a system of standard time to prevent any confusion between train stations on the length of our railroad networks. We will name the centre of these time-zones "Confederate Standard Time
column3:
and we believe that this idea will be well-liked by similarly minded countries.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187640DESC;Pioneered by men like Scott Joplin and Ernest Hogan, ragtime is a genre of music that began amongst African-Americans in the South. Afterwards, it became widely known and widely played on piano, and had a key role in popularizing new music recording methods and the later genre of jazz.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187650DESC;Blues music, like ragtime and jazz before it, was first played and composed by Afro-American musicians of the American South. While jazz enjoyed popularity amongst blacks and whites in the 1920s and 1930s, blues was mostly relegated to black listeners until after the Second World War. It was arguably formed as a musical genre in 1912 with the publishing of Hart Wand's Dallas Blues
column4:
but has its roots in traditional slave songs of the 19th century. Most famously, blues later became the bedrock for the most popular musical sensation of them all: rock n' roll.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187660DESC;Though the North always was the industrial centre of America, in the Deep South there was the city of New Orleans, always full of sound and lights. The epitome of southern prosperity, New Orleans was a hub of trade and immigration, and at its peak was the third largest city in the entire United States.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187670DESC;The city of New Orleans always has had an association with the festival of Mardi Gras, a Christian cultural celebration taking place prior to the season of Lent brought to the area by French Catholic colonists. Normally it is meant to be just a single day of celebrations, but in New Orleans the colourful and energetic Mardi Gras can last for several days more. Mardi Gras was recognized as an official state holiday of Louisiana in 1875.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187680DESC;Politeness, etiquette, and the warm comforts of home: these define the ideal of Southern hospitality, and is a major characterizing point of our nation. People are expected to respect their neighbours and use polite terms even when addressing strangers. Some feel that this is an act put on to cover up Southern flaws such as slavery and widespread poverty, but its nature can be traced back to the traditional Christian moral influence on the Southern states before secession. Regardless, it's made a good mark on our country, and we're proud of it.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
pro_slavery_propaganda_title;Spread Pro-Slavery Propaganda;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
pro_slavery_propaganda_desc;As times wears on, the institution of slavery continues to grow more and more unpopular. We will not stand for this! To improve our grip on slavery, we must spread word amongst the people that slavery is good, and will lead to a better nation. So long as there is $COUNTRY_ADJ$ doubt about slavery, this propaganda must go on.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
enslave_the_free_title;Enslave the Now Free;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
enslaved_freedom_desc;Some lucky slaves have earned their freedom, or were spared enslavement in the first place. Their freedom is at an end. We will seek them out and make them work, though it will lower our standing in the world and could spark rebellion amongst the people of $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
slavery_propaganda;Slavery Propaganda;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
enslaved_freedom;Forced Enslavement;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
orleans_growth;New Orleans Growing;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
orleans_growth_csa;New Orleans Growing;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
southern_hospitality;Southern Hospitality;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
southern_neighbours;Southern Hospitality;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
southern_hospitality_desc;We are good to those people who come into our nation, and we have become well known for this politeness and charity.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
southern_neighbours_desc;We welcome foreigners to our lands, and many of our own people act as ambassadors to the countries they visit, bringing news of our great nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187690DESC;Founded in 1871, the National Rifle Association was originally a set of shooting clubs organized to improve the marksmanship of American soldiers. After the Civil War, it was noted that few shots fired actually hit their targets, so improved drill was in order. These shooting clubs improved skill with firearms, and contributed to the military as a whole moving away from the classic style of rank and file warfare, which put focus on volume of fire rather than accuracy. Within a few decades, firearms and marksmanship became a proud part of the country's culture.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
national_rifles;National Rifle Association;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
boll_weevils;Boll Weevils;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
boll_weevils_switched;Boll Weevils;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT188000DESC;An infestation of boll weevils has struck our cotton crops in $PROVINCENAME$! Farmers are fearing that our supply of cotton won't last with this insect terrorizing our provinces, and many are suggesting that we abandon cotton to focus on different trade goods. Should we follow their advice, or try to recover the cotton?;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT188100DESC;Rising up from the south, the boll weevil is a dreadful little insect that seems to have little interest in anything but planting its eggs in cotton flowers and buds. Regardless of its origins, it poses a major threat to our cotton industry, and must be stopped at all costs. For the time being, though, we fear that there may be no direct way of containing the insect, not on a large scale.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
mexican_purchase_title;Purchase Sonora and Chihuahua;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
mexican_purchase_desc;We are still inferior to the Union, and rely on them for Pacific imports. If we can purchase the regions of Sonora and Chihuahua from Mexico, then we will be able to control a coast on the Atlantic and Pacific oceans, greatly increasing our industrial capability. An influential senator by the name of Turtledove has written up a proposal to be sent to Mexican diplomats - now, all we must do is authorize this purchase.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187700DESC;One hundred years ago, the Thirteen Colonies organized and succeeded in their rebellion against their British colonial oppressors, forming the United States of America on the 4th of July, 1776. We have seen this country through fire and water, but by God, we will never let America fall. Now unto the end of time, the United States will be a shining name in the pages of history, a beacon of freedom and democracy in the world. Today of all days, we truly should be proud.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187710DESC;Travelling along the western trails into California, a $COUNTRY_ADJ$ wagon group known as the Donner party has been discovered... or, at least, what is left of it. The people of the Donner party were stranded in the wilderness for so long that their minds were lost, and they succumbed to cannibalism and other savage acts. With the revelation of this news, the world can now see the mortifying reality of life in Western America.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187720DESC;Due to recent heavy rainfall and the negligence of a local construction company, a dam on the Little Conemaugh River has burst, flooding and decimating Johnstown, Pennsylvania. The cleanup costs will be higher than any disaster we've seen before, and more importantly, the people will soon be looking for someone to place the blame upon. The government could step in and take care of everything in place of the local industrialists and clubs that may have caused the flood, or we can require that the groups pay from their own pockets to fix their mistake.;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187730DESC;Though our war with the Confederate States is far from over, it isn't going either poorly or well. However, that doesn't stop the war from being a contentious issue, and in New York most notably the people have staged an uprising against the local government, demanding that the strict conscription practices in place for the war be rescinded. We're in the middle of a war, so we have to choose some way to deal with them, without sacrificing our draft. The question is, are these riots worth putting down, or are our other concerns far greater?;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
johnstown_flood;Johnstown Flood;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
EVT187740DESC;James Madison, fourth president of the United States of America and the man titled The Father of the Constitution
column5: was a key figure in the founding of our nation. On June 28th, 1836, he passed away - much to the chagrin of those close to him, who wished for him to follow the tradition" of Thomas Jefferson and John Adams
column6: who both died on Independence Day.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: President
column3: to address our nation. We will let them understand the problems and victories that we have seen
column4: and how we will face the coming years. Let freedom ring
column5: and let other nations see the strength of our beloved democracy!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVT187750DESC;The Gulf of Mexico is no stranger to extreme wind and rain
column2: but in 1900
column3: a certain hurricane blew away any old records. The storm decimated Galveston
column4: Texas
column5: and reached the Canadian Maritimes before dissipating completely. In cost of lives and money
column7: and this is an especially heavy blow for the coastal areas of the Gulf and Texas.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVT187760DESC;A man going by the name of Doctor Howard Henry Holmes has been apprehended and executed after murdering up to two-hundred people after the last $COUNTRY_ADJ$ World's Fair. According to police reports
column2: he built up a so-called "Murder Castle" in $CAPITAL$
column3: killing primarily young women that he lured to his lair. Using legitimate medical contacts he was able to dispose of the bodies
column4: and for a long time he remained far out of suspicion. Only after leaving the city due to economic troubles did Holmes end up being captured
column5: as a result of alleged horse theft. Afterwards the truth of his grisly crimes came to light
column6: and he was sentenced to death.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: MISSFLOOD1DESC;Along the Missouri River and the Upper Mississippi
column2: heavy rainfall and inadequate preparation have led to major floods
column3: the worst in decades. With the increasing population of $COUNTRY$ especially in the areas around the Mississippi and its tributaries
column4: it is becoming increasingly important to develop a set of levees and ditches to prevent high water from wiping out whole towns.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: MISSFLOOD2DESC;Not long after last decade's horrendous floods along the Upper Mississippi
column2: there has been another year of rain and subsequent floods along the very same Mississippi River. We had prepared and made sure riverside towns were prepared for any threat of flooding
column3: but this time the floods hit mostly rural and new colonial towns
column4: which hadn't yet managed to create systems of levees to cope with rising water levels.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: MISSFLOOD3DESC;The worst floods yet have hit many of our cities
column2: no matter how high we built the levees nor how low and long we dug the ditches. New Orleans
column3: shining gem of Louisiana
column4: has been dealt a heavy blow
column5: along with cities and regions all along the mighty Mississippi River. Even modern technology could not save us
column6: and so we can only pray that something of this scale never happens again to our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mississippi_flooding_desc;The Mississippi has burst its banks
column2: causing massive devastation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: WAR_ENSLAVE;$ORDER$War of $FIRST$ Enslavement;$ORDER$$FIRST$ guerre d'aggression;$ORDER$$FIRST$er Angriffskrieg;Wojna $ORDER$$FIRST$-$SECOND$;$ORDER$Guerra de $FIRST$ agresión;$ORDER$ Guerra $FIRST$-$SECOND$;$ORDER$$FIRST$-$SECOND$ háború;$ORDER$$FIRST$-$SECOND$ válka;;;;;;x;;;;
enforce_slavery_desc;Force the selected country to become a slave state and vassal
column2: in which industry and government will be controlled and regulated based on the needs of the slave economy.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVT189000DESC;Our country is now a slave state of $FROMCOUNTRY$
column2: and our government now functions solely to operate the mechanisms of the vile slave trade. There is no freedom left in $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA189000;Liberty has been stolen from our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA188100;We are not faced with the lesser of two weevils
column2: that is for sure.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA187750;No man could have prepared for this disaster.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187770;We should have prepared better for this! What happened to those levees?;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187778;I don't think we could have done anything to stop this.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187760;What kind of twisted madman would do this?;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187740;This man helped make our nation
column2: and he will be missed.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA187730;We cannot afford to have soldiers put down these riots. Let them end themselves.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB187730;Send in the troops. We won't let civilians ruin our war effort.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187720;Force the dam owners to pay reparations to any survivors.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB187720;Hold the dam owners blameless. This was an act of God
column2: not a liability.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA187710;How could such horror occur in our country?;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187700;Let all Americans celebrate our nation's centennial!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187690;These clubs will help the sorry state of our army
column2: and win us prestige.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTB187690;Shut them down. If they want arms
column2: let them become soldiers.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA187680;Treat all our own people like family.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB187680;Open our arms to our neighbours
column2: and bring them into our home.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA187665;Long live the jewel of the South!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187650;Nothing important will come out of this new music.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187640;What kind of backwards noise is this?;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187630;I reckon this just came right on time.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA187620;There's a sucker born every minute.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we can assimilate them into the Confederate nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: SLAVETRADEEND;An End to the Slave Trade;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC186500;With the abolition of slavery in our country
column2: so too will we block the world's slave trade.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
for the good of our nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA186000;We've moved past our old barbaric ways once and for all.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the world's leader in enforcing the end of slavery
column3: has caused us a bitter defeat. They have used their political force to demand that we end the practice of slavery in $COUNTRY$
column4: and in our position
column5: there is little that can be done.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187810;$FROMCOUNTRY$ has brought an end to slavery in their country thanks to British diplomacy!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC187820;With the renegade states at our capital and the White House in ruins
column2: we have no choice but to move the center of our nation to somewhere more secure. We could either make Philadelphia the capital once again
column3: or we could opt to move to Boston
column4: another historically important city.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187830;The Confederate Americans have already pushed into our heartlands
column2: and now they have laid claim to our capital in Mexico City. We have no choice now but to move our administration to Morelia
column3: the Spanish colonial capital from before Mexico's independence.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_mexican_capital_desc;At last we have thrown the Confederate Americans out of Mexico! They will not be able to recover from this
column2: and in triumph we must now return our capital to Mexico City. All Confederate claims to our lands are now invalid
column3: thanks to Mexican supremacy!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187840;Our people have taken to singing songs in the streets
column2: protesting the war we're fighting. These songs have gained a lot of traction amongst the populace thanks to our tradition for freedom of speech
column3: but if this goes unchecked the populace might lose all enthusiasm for the war entirely.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187850;Long have we had strong ties with the Confederate States of America
column2: and many Dixies find themselves at home here in Brazil. We hope to see even closer ties between our two countries in the future
column3: for mutual benefit.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187860;Long have we had strong ties with Brazil
column2: and many Brazilians find themselves at home here in the Confederate States of America. We hope to see even closer ties between our two countries in the future
column3: for mutual benefit.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: csa_brazilian_culture_desc;The Brazilians have long been our friends
column2: and we should accept them as brothers in our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: brazil_dixie_culture_desc;The Dixies of the CSA have long been our friends
column2: and we should accept them as brothers in our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187870;With the loss of our colonies in Hispaniola and Puerto Rico
column2: there really is no point in maintaining slavery in this modernizing world. Rather than a step forward in the name of liberty
column3: this is more or less a formality
column4: but certainly the people won't see the difference.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_female_shortage_DESC;Female children in China are valued less than males
column2: leading to an epidemic of infanticide. Our population will likely suffer due to this.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
Brazil and the Confederate States of America enjoyed warm relations
column3: even during the Civil War. Shall we foster an alliance between these two nations?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: freemason_expulsion_modifier_desc;The heretical Freemasons have been removed from the Catholic clergy in Brazil
column2: improving our standing with the people and the Vatican but severely reducing the effectiveness of our clergy for some time.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187890;There are a growing number of Freemasons within Brazilian churches
column2: which is nominally prohibited in Catholicism - they exist most commonly within Lay Fraternities
column3: which are generally charitable organizations chiefly associated with local churches
column4: though technically independent in their operation. Historically
column5: however
column6: the church in Brazil has been an apparatus of the state
column8: thus making religious issues in Brazil matters of the state
column9: not the Catholic Church. Local bishops have been calling for Freemason clergymen to resign
column10: including a man named Dom Vital
column11: who has issued an interdict against certain Lay Fraternities that have refused to have their Freemason brothers resign
column12: preventing any sacraments from being celebrated within these Fraternity buildings. This goes against the state control of the Church
column14: and is a direct challenge to government power considering that certain members of Parliament are noted Freemasons.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187892;Dom Vidal has refused to annul his controversial interdict
column2: and has been joined in protest by the bishop Antonio de Macedo Costa
column3: who has recently passed a similar interdict against uncooperative Lay Fraternities. This refusal could be used as a reason to arrest and imprison the bishops
column4: hopefully preventing them from causing more trouble in the future
column5: and to remove them as challenges to the authority of the state.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187894;Vidal and Costa have been imprisoned for acting against the power of the sovereign Brazilian state
column2: causing shock and anger amongst the Catholic populace in the country. The New Prime Minister
column3: a Freemason and a Catholic himself
column4: has called for his own resignation in the case that amnesty is not granted to Costa and Vidal. We have little choice at this point
column5: considering that keeping the bishops in prison would only lead to the government crumbling. It seems we've been dragged into a situation in which we cannot end things positively.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187900;With the Civil War having swung in favour of the Confederate States
column2: there is a growing secessionist movement in the city of New York
column3: with locals calling for New York City to leave the Union and follow its own
column4: independent path. With each passing day this movement gains more popularity
column5: and this certainly will cause a problem in the future.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187901;The inevitable has come to pass. The city of New York has ordered a referendum amongst the people
column2: calling for secession from the United States of America. The results
column3: legitimate or otherwise
column4: show that the people of New York are overwhelmingly in favour of secession
column5: and the city's officials have made it abundantly clear that
column7: there will be another Civil War at hand.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187902;We are at war for our freedom! This conflict will not be an easy one
column2: but there certainly must be other countries that can aid us in achieving the independence that we need. Shall we seek them out
column3: or face American wrath alone?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and the people of New York City have requested that we aid them in their conflict. If we choose to do so
column3: it may anger people within our own country who seek independence
column4: and certainly the Americans will be less than pleased.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187904;Diplomats from $FROMCOUNTRY$ have declared that their nation is fully in support of New York's independence
column2: and that we can expect to see $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ military and economic aid in the times to come.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we have earned our independence from the tyranny of the United States. We are free to define our own destiny
column3: to forge the path we choose as we march into the future. May the light of freedom forever shine upon New York!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: declaration_independence_ny_desc;Now that we are de facto independent from the Union
column2: we should confirm this as a constitutional truth
column3: and set ourselves as being apart from the country we have seceded from. This way
column4: the United States will have less of a claim on our territory
column5: and we can exist in peace

column1: claim_ny_state_title;Claim the State of New York;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_ny_state_desc;We currently control the city of New York
column2: and though this is a strong hub for our new country
column3: it is still small. Being the heart of New York state before we achieved independence
column4: we can justify a claim to the whole of New York State
column5: though we would not be able to remove the Union's claim on this region as we did with our capital city.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: land_of_freedom_ny_desc;We are a land of opportunity for the less fortunate of the world
column2: helping to free the oppressed from their fates
column3: allowing them to seek something new
column4: something better
column5: in our great country.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Brazilian government signed legislature to formally end the slave trade in their country
column3: but this law is not put into force. As the primary force in the world against the evils of slavery
column4: it falls upon us to ensure that Brazil follows international conventions and puts an end to the slave trade.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mulatto_african_tension_desc;There exists in Brazil a sharp tension between Brazilian-born blacks and mulattos
column2: and the African slaves taken from overseas. By favouring the mulattos and granting some of them manumission in direct opposition to the Africans
column3: we can appease Brazilian-born slaves while sparking tensions between them and the African slaves
column4: reduicng the chances that they will rebel against us.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mulatto_modifier_desc;Tensions between African-born slaves and mulatto slaves are making both groups less likely to revolt by preventing their unification against their slave masters.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC187910;Inspired by the liberal revolutions in Europe
column2: a party of Liberals in Brazil
column3: calling themselves the Praieiros
column4: has begun stirring up tensions in our country. They hope to bring an end to slavery
column5: and also expand Brazilian voting rights
column6: in order to make a more free country.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: quilombo_presence_desc;There is a hideout of escaped slaves
column2: Maroons
column3: in this province
column4: and they are causing trouble for local plantations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: Emperor of Brazil
column3: is yet too young to rule the country
column4: due to his father abdicating in 1831 in order to restore his daughter Maria to her rightful throne of Portugal. Until the child Emperor is of age
column5: the country will be looked over by parliamentary officials and a court of regents.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: it has been decided that Pedro II
column3: though still under the age of majority
column4: will reign without a regency. He has proven to be a very capable young man
column5: though he is quite shy
column6: and he is much beloved by the people. Due to the poor rulership of the regency
column8: and Dom Pedro II will officially begin his reign as Emperor of Brazil.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Magnanimous
column3: has passed away this morning. The people of Brazil loved him until the very end
column4: and his impeccable rulership brought a true golden age to the Empire of Brazil. Working towards the cause of abolition and civil freedom
column5: Dom Pedro made many influential friends
column7: from Friedrich Nietzsche and Alexander Graham Bell to Victor Hugo and Charles Darwin. An intellectual and a devoted emperor
column8: in his later years he found himself disappointed with the role of a ruler
column9: so perhaps with his passing he has achieved the happiness that eluded him all his life.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187917;The imperial administration of Dom Pedro II has
column2: with the recent coup and overthrow of the government
column3: been reduced to dust. The emperor has officially and willingly abdicated the throne
column4: and has not tried to retake it or resist the end of the Empire. Government of the country is being transferred to a council of able governors
column5: and the royal family of Brazil and Portugal are hereby exiled from this country for ever more.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: national_speech_desc;A great speech has been delivered in our true and free democracy.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
regency_modifier_desc;Our nation is under a fragile regency
column2: with the monarchy lacking the power that it should truly have. Beware
column3: for this may encourage coup attempts by disgruntled people in our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: dom_pedro_ii_desc;The magnanimous Dom Pedro II is the Emperor of Brazil. A powerful and respected statesman
column2: he is beloved by the people and has an inextinguishable fire in his heart for the further freedom of his people and their continued greatness.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: enslave_the_free_desc;Some lucky slaves have earned their freedom
column2: or were spared enslavement in the first place. Their freedom is at an end. We will seek them out and make them work
column3: though it will lower our standing in the world and could spark rebellion amongst the people of $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: tex_claim_rio_grande_desc;Proper Texan lands pass across the banks of the Rio Grande into what is considered Mexican territory. We
column2: as a now independent nation
column3: can claim the whole of the Rio Grande region for our own
column4: and make it Texan as it should be.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: progressive_society_csa_desc;A group of enterprising capitalists have formed a Progressive Society in this province
column2: in an attempt to discredit slavery.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: marxist_slaves_desc;Slaves in this province have been reading and learning the ideas of Marx and other communist philosophers.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
immigrant_workers_csa_desc;Factory and owners and other employers in this province have been hiring immigrants and other cheap labour
column2: as they cost less than maintaining slaves.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187925;A free man of black ancestry has given a speech at a national university. Many were impressed by his eloquence and the intelligence in his arguments against slavery
column2: saying that 'in a land of freedom
column3: we celebrate the sight of a man in chains.' He could become a major force in the cause of abolitionism
column4: and already pro-slave politicians have demanded that his speeches be censored.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187926;Capitalists have formed what they call a 'Progressive Society' in $PROVINCENAME$
column2: hoping to bring an end to slavery. Their reasoning is that slavery
column3: as a rural
column4: plantation-based economic model
column5: has no place in a nation attempting to industrialize and compete in the modern economy.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the sound of 'The Internationale' can be heard more loudly and frequently than old slave songs. Many working slaves
column3: having learned to read
column4: have also learned about the philosophies of men like Karl Marx
column5: and his vision of a world without social classes. What they intend should be obvious
column6: considering their situation in our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187935;Factories dot the landscape where once there used to be plantations and farms that ran on the blood and sweat of slaves. In this new $COUNTRY$
column2: though
column3: employers have begun hiring cheap workers
column4: often immigrants
column5: because the cost of keeping slaves has become unsustainable for many. Arguments could be made against them that they are sabotaging the economy
column7: they have the right to employ whomever they choose.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: hoping to establish good relations with our country
column3: are aboard the HMS Trent. We have received urgent news lately
column4: however
column5: that the American USS San Jacinto has intercepted the Trent and taken the diplomats as prisoners. This can be seen as an act of war on British territory
column6: and many are calling for an American apology and reparations for this insult.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187942;We have received word that the British
column2: after their HMS Trent was commandeered by a Union captain on the USS San Jacinto. The Trent is carrying two Confederate diplomats
column3: en route to Britain and France
column4: no doubt in order to coerce them into joining the war. The British are demanding an apology from our officials and the immediate release of the diplomats
column5: and have been making isolated showings of force along the Canadian border.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187943;Delegates from the United States have apologized and released the two Confederate envoys into British care. They made several demonstrations that they would not interfere with British shipping in any way in the future
column2: and our own officials came back quite pleased with the meeting. Of course
column3: at this point we certainly cannot join the Confederates
column4: or offer them any support
column5: in light of tense Anglo-American relations as a result of the Trent affair.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187944;The United States has begun to position troops along its border with our colony in Canada
column2: making it clear that they will not back down. Official delegates from the United States government declare that what they did was only an act of war against the Confederates
column3: but if British diplomats press the Trent issue
column4: then the Union will consider Britain on the side of the Confederate secessionists
column5: and react accordingly. It seems that there is no choice now but war.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: UNY_bourgeois_dictatorship;the Most Serene Republic of New York and Long Island;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the use of the dreaded lash to discipline soldiers has been officially banned for several years. However
column3: many white officers still use it to keep their typically black
column4: sometimes even ex-slave crews in line
column5: causing accusations of institutionalized discrimination in the military. Several all-black crews have recently revolted against their officers
column8: threatening to bombard the city. They are demanding amnesty and reparations
column10: a promise we may not be able to completely deliver.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187919;Though the Atlantic slave trade has been dismantled by the British
column2: many traders in Brazil have found ways to smuggle slaves into our country. Here in $PROVINCENAME$
column3: new slaves have been sold into plantations; they may improve our economy
column4: but the British may eventually catch on if we don't put an end to this.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: a young slave girl has found a priceless treasure: a massive diamond
column3: certainly one of the biggest in the world. The girl
column4: for finding this gem
column5: has been granted her freedom
column7: called the Star of the South

column1: EVTDESC187921;In order to protect the scenery and nature of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ wilderness
column2: a service has been created to allow the flora and fauna of this country to thrive unhindered. This National Parks Service will prevent the natural environment from being unnecessarily overrun by human development
column3: and will show to $COUNTRY$
column4: her people
column5: and the world
column6: the true beauty of the wilderness.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: fair weather
column3: close access to the Pacific and abundance of natural resources - including gold! - the state of California is rapidly booming in population
column4: showing an unprecedented demographic increase due to natural increase and mass immigration. California will be an integral part of $COUNTRY$ in no time
column5: and this upward trend does not look to be ending soon.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: our Emperor Dom Pedro II has quite a lot of time to travel the world and meet the many personalities therein. With his daughter Isabel at home as his regent
column3: Dom Pedro is able to visit Egypt
column4: Britain
column5: Austria and France
column6: speaking with intellectuals and even ordinary people. He always demands that he is treated as just a man
column8: and he has gained considerable fame overseas.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC187924;California's population has drastically increased over a short period of time
column2: and while for a time this was one of the largest migrations in our country's history
column3: it has now begun to slow
column4: to a trickle. California is still booming
column5: but perhaps not as strongly as before.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
